label: A5BC3_tI36_140_cl_b_ah-001
title: Cs$_{3}$CoCl$_{5}$ ($K3_{1}$) Structure
comments:
We show the structure using the data taken at 4.2K. 
 We list the quaternary form of this structure as \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C5D_tI36_140_a_h_cl_b-001}{BaLa$_{2}$ZnO$_{5}$}. 
 Removing the Cl-II atoms from the (4c) site reduces this to the \href{current_web_home_dir/A5BC2_tI32_140_bl_a_h-001}{NH$_{4}$Pb$_{2}$Br$_{5}$ ($K3_{4}$) structure}. 
 There are many quaternary compounds with this structure.  See the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C5D_tI36_140_a_h_cl_b-001}{BaLa$_{2}$ZnO$_{5}$} prototype for more details.
